message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%.
I think we can be fairer than that. How about a 60/40 split in my favor?
I'm willing to meet you halfway on the 60/40 split.  Let's make it 60/40 in my favor this time.
Okay Alice, let's find a compromise. I'll take slightly less than last time, how about a 55/45 split?
